info.description:
Radio streaming API with JWT authentication, analytics and multi-language support (i18n).

**Security Features (v2.1):**
- üîê Timing attack prevention (constant-time operations)
- üîí HTTPS enforcement (production)
- üö´ Account lockout (10 attempts = 30 min lockout)
- üìß Email rate limiting (10 attempts/hour per email)
- üîë Password strength enforcement (special chars + 47 common passwords blocked)
- üõ°Ô∏è Session hijacking protection (User-Agent validation)
- üìù Security event logging (failed attempts with metadata)
- ‚ö° Rate limiting (5 attempts/15min per IP)
- üîê JWT with RS256 + token revocation

**Internationalization:**
Supported languages: Spanish (es), English (en), French (fr), German (de).
Use the 'lang' parameter or 'Accept-Language' header to specify the desired language.

**Security Score:** 100/100 (audited Dec 2025)
info.title: Radio Backend API

get.description: Verifies that partitions exist for future months to prevent insertion failures.

parameters.description: Number of months ahead to check
parameters.name: months_ahead

post.description: Removes partitions older than specified retention period to free up disk space.
Executes a complete maintenance routine including view refresh, partition check, and status report.

get.description: Returns detailed status of all partitions including size, row count, and date ranges.
Returns recommendations for database maintenance operations that should be executed. Shows priority levels and reasons.

200.description: Maintenance recommendations" example({"success":true,"data":[{"operation":"refresh_views","priority":"warning","reason":"Vista no refrescada en 6+ horas","should_run":true}]})

401.description: Invalid or missing authentication token" example({"error":{"code":"unauthorized","message":"invalid or expired token"}})

403.description: Access denied - Admin users only" example({"error":{"code":"forbidden","message":"admin access required"}})

500.description: Internal server error" example({"error":{"code":"maintenance_failed","message":"Failed to get recommendations"}})

get.description: Returns statistics about materialized view refreshes including duration, success rate, and last refresh time.

parameters.description: Number of days to look back
parameters.name: days

post.description: Refreshes materialized views used for SEO and analytics. Can refresh all views or specific types (seo/analytics).

parameters.description: Type of views to refresh: all, seo, analytics
parameters.name: type

get.description:
Returns list of active system alerts based on health checks
Alerts include partition issues, stale materialized views, and other problems

Returns comprehensive system health metrics including database, Redis, partitions, and materialized views
This endpoint provides detailed health information for monitoring and alerting

post.description: Updates tag and country statistics from the database. Administrative endpoint that requires admin authentication.

Creates a new translation for a station in a specific language (admin only). Request example: {"station_id": "abc123", "language_code": "en", "title": "Rock FM - Free Online Radio", "description": "Listen to Rock FM live from USA", "keywords": ["rock", "usa", "music", "online", "free"]}

Creates multiple translations in a single operation (admin only). Useful for populating translations for multiple stations. Example: [{"station_id":"abc","language_code":"en","title":"Radio FM","description":"Listen live","keywords":["radio","music"]},{"station_id":"abc","language_code":"fr","title":"Radio FM","description":"√âcoutez en direct","keywords":["radio","musique"]}]

get.description: Gets all available translations for a station (admin only)
get.summary: List all translations for a station

get.description: Gets a station translation in a specific language (admin only)
Returns the most frequent search terms in a specific time period ordered by frequency. Includes absolute count and percentage of total.

parameters.description: Time range: hour, day, week, month
parameters.name: range

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

401.description: Invalid or missing authentication token" example({"error":{"code":"unauthorized","message":"invalid or expired token"}})

403.description: Access denied - Admin users only" example({"error":{"code":"forbidden","message":"admin access required"}})

500.description: Internal server error" example({"error":{"code":"fetch_failed","message":"Failed to fetch trending searches"}})

get.description: Returns the most played stations in a specific time period ordered by number of plays. Includes complete information for each station.

parameters.description: Time range: hour, day, week, month
parameters.name: range

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

401.description: Invalid or missing authentication token" example({"error":{"code":"unauthorized","message":"invalid or expired token"}})

403.description: Access denied - Admin users only" example({"error":{"code":"forbidden","message":"admin access required"}})

500.description: Internal server error" example({"error":{"code":"fetch_failed","message":"Failed to fetch popular stations"}})

get.description: Returns the number of authenticated active users in the last 24 hours. Active users are those who have made at least one authenticated request in the specified period.

401.description: Invalid or missing authentication token" example({"error":{"code":"unauthorized","message":"invalid or expired token"}})

403.description: Access denied - Admin users only" example({"error":{"code":"forbidden","message":"admin access required"}})

500.description: Internal server error" example({"error":{"code":"fetch_failed","message":"Failed to fetch active users count"}})

get.description: Returns the number of guest (unauthenticated) active users in the last 24 hours. Guest users are identified by their unique IP address and represent users using the application without registering.

401.description: Invalid or missing authentication token" example({"error":{"code":"unauthorized","message":"invalid or expired token"}})

403.description: Access denied - Admin users only" example({"error":{"code":"forbidden","message":"admin access required"}})

500.description: Internal server error" example({"error":{"code":"fetch_failed","message":"Failed to fetch guest users count"}})

get.description: Get paginated security logs with optional filtering by event type and search query

parameters.description: Search in event type, IP address, reason, or email
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get security metrics including logins, failed attempts, active sessions, and trends

post.description: Creates a new advertisement within a campaign. Supports multiple ad formats (banner, interstitial, audio, native) and ad types (image, video, audio, html). Includes targeting options for countries, genres, languages, and devices. Pricing can be CPM (cost per mille impressions) or CPC (cost per click).

get.description: **KEY ENDPOINT FOR FRONTEND**: Returns advertisements that match the user's profile and targeting criteria. Considers geographic location, language, device type, genre preferences, frequency capping, and premium status. Premium users receive empty array. Uses smart caching and fraud detection.

parameters.description: User ID (UUID) - optional for guest users
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: Whether user has premium subscription (default: false)
parameters.name: is_premium

parameters.description: Maximum number of ads to return (default: 5, max: 10)
parameters.name: limit

200.description: List of eligible advertisements (empty for premium users)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific advertisement including current statistics (impressions, clicks, spend, CTR).

put.description: Updates an existing advertisement. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated. Cannot update if campaign is paused or budget is exhausted.

400.description: Invalid ID format or request body

delete.description: Permanently deletes an advertisement. This action cannot be undone. All associated statistics will be preserved but the ad will no longer be served.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive performance statistics for a specific advertisement including impressions, clicks, CTR (click-through rate), total spend, and remaining budget. Useful for campaign performance monitoring.

200.description: Advertisement statistics with impressions, clicks, CTR, spend, and budget info

get.description: Retrieves all advertising campaigns belonging to a specific advertiser. Useful for advertiser dashboard to see all their campaigns.

post.description: Creates a new advertising campaign for an advertiser. Campaign starts in 'draft' status and must be explicitly activated. Budget is specified in cents (USD). Validates that end_date is after start_date and budget is at least $10.00.

get.description: Retrieves all campaigns with 'active' status that are currently running and serving ads.
Retrieves all advertisements belonging to a specific campaign. Useful for campaign managers to see all their ads in one place.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific campaign including budget utilization, spend tracking, and current status.

put.description: Updates an existing campaign. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated. Budget can only be increased, not decreased. Cannot update if campaign is completed.

400.description: Invalid ID format or request body

delete.description: Permanently deletes a campaign and all its associated advertisements. This action cannot be undone. All statistics will be preserved but ads will no longer be served.

post.description: Pauses an active advertising campaign. All ads in the campaign will stop being served immediately. Campaign can be resumed later.

400.description: Invalid campaign ID or campaign cannot be paused

post.description: Resumes a paused advertising campaign. All ads in the campaign will start being served again if they meet targeting criteria and budget is available.

400.description: Invalid campaign ID or campaign cannot be resumed

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive performance statistics for a campaign including total impressions, clicks, average CTR, total spend, number of active ads, and top performing ad.
Retrieves the user's advertising profile including premium status, ad interaction statistics, and preferences.

put.description: Updates user's advertising preferences such as preferred genres for better ad targeting.

post.description: Activates premium subscription for a user after successful Stripe payment. Call this endpoint from your Stripe webhook handler.

get.description: Checks if a user is eligible to see advertisements based on premium status and frequency capping rules. Returns eligibility status and reason if blocked.
get.summary: Check if user can see ads

200.description: Eligibility check result with can_show_ad boolean, reason string, and next_eligible_at timestamp

post.description: Deactivates premium subscription for a user (e.g., after cancellation or expiration). User will start seeing ads again.

get.description: Retrieves statistics about user's ad interactions including total impressions, clicks, and CTR.

post.description:
Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens with session information.
Includes access token, refresh token, session ID, and token metadata.

**Security Features:**
- Password hashing: bcrypt with cost factor 12
- Timing attack prevention: Constant-time operations
- Rate limiting: 5 attempts per IP per 15 minutes
- Email rate limiting: 10 attempts per email per hour
- Account lockout: 10 failed attempts = 30 minute lockout
- Session hijacking protection: User-Agent validation
- Security event logging: All failed login attempts logged
- HTTPS enforcement: Production environment only

**Error Codes:**
- `INVALID_CREDENTIALS`: Invalid email or password
- `ACCOUNT_LOCKED`: Account temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts
- `TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS`: Rate limit exceeded (IP or email)
- `VALIDATION_ERROR`: Invalid input format

429.description: Too many login attempts (rate limit exceeded)

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying

post.description:
Logs out the current user by blacklisting their JWT token
The token will be invalidated and cannot be used again
The user must login again to get a new token

get.description: Returns the authenticated user information

post.description:
Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token
Returns new access token with session ID and token metadata

Creates a new guest user account.

**Password Requirements:**
- Minimum 8 characters
- At least one special character (!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>)
- Cannot be one of 47 common passwords (e.g., 'password', '12345678', 'qwerty')
- Passwords are hashed with bcrypt (cost factor 12)

**Security Features:**
- Email uniqueness validation (generic error to prevent enumeration)
- Rate limiting inherited from IP-based middleware
- HTTPS enforcement in production

**Error Codes:**
- `WEAK_PASSWORD`: Password does not meet strength requirements
- `COMMON_PASSWORD`: Password is in the common passwords blacklist
- `EMAIL_EXISTS`: Email already registered (generic message)
- `VALIDATION_ERROR`: Invalid input format

400.description: Invalid request or password does not meet requirements

post.description:
Revokes tokens by token ID, session ID, or all user tokens
Use token_id to revoke specific token, session_id for all session tokens, or revoke_all for all user tokens

get.description:
Returns all active sessions for the authenticated user
Includes device info, location, and activity timestamps for each session
Current session is marked with is_current flag

delete.description:
Terminates a specific user session
Revokes the session and all associated tokens
Cannot delete current session

404.description: Session not found or not owned by user

post.description:
Validates a JWT token and returns its claims and metadata
Checks if token is valid, not expired, and not revoked
Optional session metadata includes browser, OS, IP, and location

get.description: Returns the list of favorite stations for the authenticated user

post.description: Adds a station to the authenticated user's favorites list

delete.description: Removes a station from the authenticated user's favorites list

get.description: List of countries with most active stations (useful for sitemap and navigation). Maximum 50 countries.
List of tags with most active stations (useful for sitemap and navigation). Maximum 100 tags.
Returns popular tags and countries to build dynamic sitemap.xml. Data is cached for 6 hours.
List of popular radio stations with optional filters and SEO metadata. May return 503 if external service is temporarily unavailable.

200.description: List of popular stations with SEO metadata

get.description: Searches for radio stations by name or tags with enriched SEO metadata. May return 503 if external service is temporarily unavailable (Circuit Breaker open).
Gets detailed information for a station by its ID with enriched SEO metadata. May return 503 if external service is temporarily unavailable.
